item.title: Sam Altman is back as CEO, Mira Murati as CTO and Greg Brockman as President. OpenAI has a new initial board. Messages from @sama and board chair @btaylor https://openai.com/blog/sam-altman-returns-as-ceo-openai-has-a-new-initial-board
item.content:encoded: Sam Altman is back as CEO, Mira Murati as CTO and Greg Brockman as President. OpenAI has a new initial board. Messages from @sama and board chair @btaylor openai.com/blog/sam-altman-r‚Ä¶

item.title: OpenAI is nothing without its people

We have reached an agreement in principle for Sam Altman to return to OpenAI as CEO with a new initial board of Bret Taylor (Chair), Larry Summers, and Adam D'Angelo.
We are collaborating to figure out the details. Thank you so much for your patience through this.
item.content:encoded:
We have reached an agreement in principle for Sam Altman to return to OpenAI as CEO with a new initial board of Bret Taylor (Chair), Larry Summers, and Adam D'Angelo.

We are collaborating to figure out the details. Thank you so much for your patience through this.

item.title:
ChatGPT with voice is now available to all free users. Download the app on your phone and tap the headphones icon to start a conversation.

item.title: Our OpenAI DevDay Breakout Sessions are now live on YouTube. Check out deeper dives of our new features for developers, techniques for maximizing LLM performance, and more. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOXw6I10VTv-exVCRuRjbT6bqkfO74rWz
item.content:encoded: Our OpenAI DevDay Breakout Sessions are now live on YouTube. Check out deeper dives of our new features for developers, techniques for maximizing LLM performance, and more. youtube.com/playlist?list=PL‚Ä¶

item.title: Announcing OpenAI Data Partnerships ‚Äî help steer the future of AI by collaborating on public and private datasets with us. https://openai.com/blog/data-partnerships
item.content:encoded: Announcing OpenAI Data Partnerships ‚Äî help steer the future of AI by collaborating on public and private datasets with us. openai.com/blog/data-partner‚Ä¶

item.title:
We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for:
1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresher knowledge than GPT-4. Its input and output tokens are respectively 3√ó and 2√ó less expensive than GPT-4. It‚Äôs available now to all developers in preview.
2. Assistants API and new tools (Retrieval, Code Interpreter) will help developers build world-class AI assistants within their own apps.
3. The platform is becoming multimodal. GPT-4 Turbo with Vision, DALL¬∑E 3, and text-to-speech are all now available to developers.
Oh‚Ä¶ and we‚Äôre doubling GPT-4 rate limits. https://openai.com/blog/new-models-and-developer-products-announced-at-devday
item.content:encoded:
We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for:

1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresher knowledge than GPT-4. Its input and output tokens are respectively 3√ó and 2√ó less expensive than GPT-4. It‚Äôs available now to all developers in preview.

2. Assistants API and new tools (Retrieval, Code Interpreter) will help developers build world-class AI assistants within their own apps.

3. The platform is becoming multimodal. GPT-4 Turbo with Vision, DALL¬∑E 3, and text-to-speech are all now available to developers.

Oh‚Ä¶ and we‚Äôre doubling GPT-4 rate limits. openai.com/blog/new-models-a‚Ä¶

item.title:
R to @OpenAI: Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at http://chatgpt.com/create.
Later this month, we‚Äôll launch the GPT Store, so people can feature and make money from their GPTs. We plan to offer GPTs to more users soon.
item.content:encoded:
Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at chatgpt.com/create.

Later this month, we‚Äôll launch the GPT Store, so people can feature and make money from their GPTs. We plan to offer GPTs to more users soon.

item.title: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home ‚Äî and then share that creation with others. No code required. https://openai.com/blog/introducing-gpts
item.content:encoded: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home ‚Äî and then share that creation with others. No code required. openai.com/blog/introducing-‚Ä¶

item.title:
We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI‚Äîfrom today's models to AGI.
Goal: a quantitative, evidence-based methodology, beyond what is accepted as possible: https://openai.com/blog/frontier-risk-and-preparedness
item.content:encoded:
We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI‚Äîfrom today's models to AGI.

Goal: a quantitative, evidence-based methodology, beyond what is accepted as possible: openai.com/blog/frontier-ris‚Ä¶

item.title:
R to @OpenAI: The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safety over the next year:
- Identifying best practices - Advancing AI safety research - Facilitating information sharing among companies and governments
Learn more about the FMF: http://frontiermodelforum.org
item.content:encoded:
The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safety over the next year:

- Identifying best practices
- Advancing AI safety research
- Facilitating information sharing among companies and governments

Learn more about the FMF: frontiermodelforum.org

item.title: Today, we are announcing Chris Meserole as the Executive Director of the Frontier Model Forum, and the creation of a new AI Safety Fund, a $10 million initiative to promote research in the field of AI safety. https://openai.com/blog/frontier-model-forum-updates
item.content:encoded: Today, we are announcing Chris Meserole as the Executive Director of the Frontier Model Forum, and the creation of a new AI Safety Fund, a $10 million initiative to promote research in the field of AI safety. openai.com/blog/frontier-mod‚Ä¶

item.title: R to @OpenAI: "My business partner and I are creating a coffee shop inspired by our mutual love for rabbits. We have a logo we like a lot that is minimalist with a rabbit, but anxious to get your take on it."
item.content:encoded: "My business partner and I are creating a coffee shop inspired by our mutual love for rabbits. We have a logo we like a lot that is minimalist with a rabbit, but anxious to get your take on it."
